name: Crimson Seed
loreDescription: A token in the shape of the small flame emblem of Meldrec, used as proof of friendly relations and to show that an outsider has been granted passage through Meldrec by the great chief.

skillDescription.base: Has a 35.0% chance to dispel one debuff when attacked. Can be activated once per turn.
skillDescription.max: Has a 70.0% chance to dispel one debuff when attacked. Can be activated once per turn.
